title: Automated Vulnerability Classification & Prioritization
description: ML-assisted triage framework for vulnerability classification and prioritization in multi-tenant SaaS environments.

title: Explainable AI Framework for Simulation-Based Decision Systems
description: Method for generating structured explanations for simulation-driven ML models using SHAP, gradient analysis, and sensitivity indices.

title: AI-Driven Document Intelligence Normalization Pipeline
description: Architecture for document extraction using rule-enhanced NLP and ONNX-based inference with explainability layers.

title: Distributed Simulation Job Orchestration Framework
description: Kubernetes-native orchestration framework for large-scale simulation tasks with metadata tracking and deterministic replay.
